text: park seo-joon (born park yong-gyu on december 16, 1988) is a south korean actor. he is best known for his roles in the television dramas kill me, heal me (2015), she was pretty (2015), hwarang: the poet warrior youth (2016–2017), fight for my way (2017), and what's wrong with secretary kim (2018), and the film chronicles of evil (2015) midnight runners (2017).
